data.question: What is the empirical formula of (DIM)Ni(NO3)2?
What is the final R indices for the observed data of (DIM)Ni(NO)(OTf)?
What method was used for absorption correction in the crystallographic data collection of (OBPin)2Ni2(NO)2(Pz)?
What is the crystal system and space group for (DIM)Ni(NO2)2?
Based on the DFT calculations, which is lower in energy, the hyponitrite species or the dinitrosyl species for isomers of empirical formula (DIM)Ni(N2O2)?
data.answer: The hyponitrite species is lower in energy

data.question: What is the calculated density of [(DIM)Ni(NO)]2?
Is the (DIM)Ni(NO)2 dinitrosyl triplet state lower or higher in energy compared to the singlet state?
data.answer: The triplet state is lower in energy by 7.3 kcal/mol

data.question: What is the maximum transmission coefficient based on crystal size for (DIM)Ni(NO)(OTf)?
What is the volume of the unit cell for (OBPin)2Ni2(NO)2(Bpy)?
Does the structure of (DIM)Ni(NO)(ONO) have disorder?
data.answer: Yes, with Ni coordinated to a triflate molecule as the major disorder component

data.question: What is the wavelength used in the data collection for (DIM)Ni(NO2)2?
What is the goodness-of-fit on F2 for the structure refinement of (OBPin)2Ni2(NO)2(Pz)?
Is the calculated density of (OBPin)2Ni2(NO)2(Bpy) higher than that of (DIM)Ni(NO)(OTf)?
What is the space group for the crystal structure of [(DIM)Ni(NO)]2?
Was the intrinsic methods solution used for the structure solution of (DIM)Ni(NO)(OTf)?
What is the largest diff. peak and hole for the structure refinement of (OBPin)2Ni2(NO)2(Bpy)?
What is the theta range for data collection of (DIM)Ni(NO)(ONO)?
Is the crystal system for (DIM)Ni(NO2)2 the same as for (DIM)Ni(NO)(OTf)?
What is the absorption coefficient for (OBPin)2Ni2(NO)2(Pz)?
Was the Multi-Scan method (SADABS) used for absorption correction in the crystallographic data collection of (DIM)Ni(NO)(ONO)?
